snippet: The administration searched staff e-mails to try to root out the source of leaks to the news media in a cheating scandal, and the staff members were not told until months later.
abstract: Harvard secretly searched e-mail accounts of several of its staff members in fall 2012, looking for source of news media leaks about its recent cheating scandal, but did not tell them about searchs for several months.
lead_paragraph: The administration searched staff e-mails to try to root out the source of leaks to the news media in a cheating scandal, and the staff members were not told until months later.

headline.main: Harvard Searched E-Mails for Source of Media Leaks
headline.print_headline: Harvard Hacked E-Mails In Search of Media Leaks
